welcomeTitle: Welcome to the Student Result Portal
welcomeDesc: Enter your GR Number and Date of Birth to view your academic result.
studentPortalDesc: View your academic results by entering your GR No and Date of Birth.
teacherPortalDesc: Upload and manage student results with an easy-to-use interface.
aboutDesc1: Our Student Result Portal is designed to streamline the process of managing and accessing academic results. Teachers can easily upload student performance data, while students and parents can securely view results using GR number and date of birth.
aboutDesc2: The system ensures privacy, simplicity, and quick access to academic performance.

studentPanel.title: Student Result Portal
studentPanel.subtitle: Enter your GR Number and Date of Birth to view your result.
studentPanel.noResultsDesc: Please verify your GR Number and Date of Birth and try again.

errors.noResults: No results found. Please check your GR Number and Date of Birth.
errors.general: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
